overview:
Jared Reed is a renaissance Search Marketer with experience in email marketing, Social Media, SEO, display advertising, and PPC. This broad background enables him to create unified strategies for brands across all digital channels and use data from one channel to inform decisions in another. His work runs the gamut from small, local businesses to household brand names like Dell Computers, Shasta, Purina, Botox, Columbia Sportswear, Kotex, and Coach.

Jared has cultivated relationships with the major search engines and has been a beta tester for the Bing interface, Google’s Agency Land Search Marketing education portal, as well as numerous social media analytics platforms. Jared is also certified in the use of Google’s Adwords PPC marketing program, Google Analytics, and proficient with paid advertising on various Social Media networks.

Because of his experience with digital marketing, Jared has been asked to speak at several local conferences and has been asked to blog for Searchfuel, Trada, Hubspot, and Social Fresh.
